posts.post_content:
Good morning,

I am looking to buy some t206 tolstoi cards. My perfect match would be SGC 50 cards, but happy to look at SGC 40-60. Will consider PSA cards of the same grades but would need scans. Will pay competitive prices not ebay whacked out BIN prices.

Send me what you got, thanks - Rob

[url]rgutheil@gmail.com[/url]
I just posted a camnitiz a few threads above...might be a grade or two too low...

I have a PSA 4 Homerun Frank Baker with a Tolstoi back $375 shipped it is the only Baker with a Tolstoi back in their pop report the last time I checked. I can send scan tomorrow if interested. Thanks Daryl [url]bafraley@msn.com[/url]
